hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.js$'; then npx eslint --no-warn-ignored --quiet "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q 'gameConfig.js'; then echo 'BLOCK: Use Edit, not Write, on gameConfig.js (single source of truth). Full overwrites risk losing tuned balance values.'; exit 2; fi
